author: Alex

text: Oh, the circle of life... I like that :)
author: CleverDjembe

text: The fourth entry is probably my favorite, and I typically like the older-style games more. I just loved the setting, the atmosphere, and the untold story of the Fourth Wild Arms. Seriously, nothing was cooler than walking through war-torn ruins.

author: earthboundkid1

text:
I thought the series got its highest peak at the 3rd game. The 4th and 5th ones are okay, but I'm not really a fan of the HEX battle system. 

The soundtracks though are pretty much great stuff in general! You can feel Naruke's really got it right for the entire serie!

text: Oh, cool. From what I have seen, it looks pretty fun. The music is great as well.

author: Mandy O'Connor

text: A pretty sad theme. I'm a fan of Kouda's contribution to the Wild Arms series. He's responsible for the music in Devil May Cry for those who don't know.
